summary: Made this armour for my main character. Thought I'd share with everyone =D
descriptionHtml:
[NOTE: The Female mesh still seems bugged. I don't have the time to fix it just yet, but will try to get to it over the next month or so. Until then I recomend just using the male version.]

Released version 1.2
Finally managed to upload the whole file! =D


======================================================================================

Made this armour for my main character "Jinn". Thought I'd share with everyone =D

The concept is a veteran Blade who has managed to avoid the Thalmor and keep a low profile desguised as an adventurer.

Armour is a light armor and has the same stats as the Blades armor but is much lighter.
Requires Steel smithing to make, Advanced Armours to upgrade

Note: This is my first armour modification so there may be some slight clipping etc.

Credit:
L0rd0fWar: for converting the Witcher 2 armours
CD Projekt: For making the Witcher 2
author: Wintercross
